home.intro: I'm a design-minded front-end software engineer focused on building beautiful interfaces & experiences

about.detail: building things for the web with some awesome people.
about.detailSecond: As a software engineer, I enjoy bridging the gap between engineering and design — combining my technical knowledge with my keen eye for design to create a beautiful product. My goal is to always build applications that are scalable and efficient under the hood while providing engaging, pixel-perfect user experiences.
